summary: Provides a routine that translates a two‑qubit CNOT‑dihedral operator into an equivalent QuantumCircuit composed of CNOTs, single‑qubit Pauli and phase gates, enabling exact synthesis of this gate class.
business_intent: Enable Qiskit users and compiler tools to generate concrete circuit implementations for arbitrary two‑qubit CNOT‑dihedral operations, supporting compilation, optimization, and execution of algorithms that rely on this gate set.
